name: EConnect - Project 2
project: Full-stack web application that utilizes MVC design pattern. Create events and invite your friends, relatives or co-workers

name: All You Can Eat Burgers
project: Just fun app to create your own burgers. You can create a burger, devour and delete it!

name: Weather Dashboard
project: View current weather conditions and five day weather forecast for a city of your choice.

name: JavaScript Quiz
project: Answer basic JavaScript questions in 75 sec. Bonus points are added based on your timing.

name: Daily Planner
project: A simple daily planner application that allows a user to update and save events for each hour of the work day.

name: Travel Guide - Project 1
project: Select a city to view travel attractions by category and weather forescast for the next five days.
